person.persName: Ozias Mather Hatch (Springfield, IL, secretary of state of IL (1856-1864))

body.p: Springfield, Illinois, merchant and politician. Hillsborough County, New Hampshire, native. Son of Reuben Hatch and Lucy Andrews Hatch. Married to Julia Reilly Enos Hatch in 1860. Father of Ozais M. Hatch. Merchant in Griggsville, Illinois, in from 1836 to 1838. Partner with Solomon McNeil in McNeil & Hatch in Griggsville from 1838 to 1841. Clerk of the Pike Circuit Court from 1841 to 1848. Farmer in Pike County in 1850. Member of the Legislature of the state of Illinois. Resident of Springfield in 1860. Republican Party Secretary of State for Illinois from 1856 to 1864.
